E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1977
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Dick McAuliffe



Date: Friday, 4/4/1977
Subject: Bob Boone is sick...
Diagnosis: Viral Infection.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor
